name: Pretty Pyro
description:
A short game where you help Pretty Pyro and her familiar Drako solve a bunch of fire problems with more fire. And flames. And burning. And heat. And blaze. And some plasma for good measure.

Credits:

CREDITS:

-Victor Moura for dragon face.
